H0.text: when was the problem of cfc 's discovered. 1957

H1.text: when was the problem of cfc 's discovered. 1969

H2.text: when was the problem of cfc 's discovered. 1970

H3.text: when was the problem of cfc 's discovered. 1974

A4.text: The damage caused by CFCs was discovered by Sherry Rowland and Mario Molina in 1974.

A5.text: It wasn't until 1974 that it was first discovered by two University of California chemists that the use of chlorofluorocarbons were causing a significant depletion in atmospheric ozone concentrations.
